metadata.title: Weekly Memory Recap

slides.title: Summary
lines: This week was a blend of health-focused reflections and culinary adventures, highlighting moments of stress and joy.

slides.title: Highlights
lines: - curious day centered on health; key moment was weekend hike in the hills.
- content day centered on learning; key moment was trying a new recipe.
- stressed day centered on health; key moment was heads-down work sprint.

slides.title: Looking Ahead
lines: Here's to more curious days ahead!

scene_prompts: Flat pastel cartoon illustration, soft gradients, minimal shading, clean shapes, 2D, wide 16:9 composition, no text, no captions, no logos, no watermarks. Recurring character in every scene: friendly androgynous adult, short wavy hair, warm teal sweater, expressive eyes, calm smile. Keep character design consistent. Scene: The character reviews a weekly calendar on a desk, soft icons floating around (hearts, stars, speech bubbles). Date range: 2025-12-19 to 2025-12-26.
